summary: Craft lockpicks at forges, and improve your results as you unlock smithing perks!
descriptionHtml:
This mod enables you to turn 1 steel ingot into 5 lockpicks.

Not enough return on your investment? Want 10 lockpicks? Unlock the Steel Smithing perk, and you can make 10 lockpicks from 1 steel ingot!

What\'s that? It\'s still not enough? Fine -- once you reach Advanced Armors, your skill working with steel lets you make 15 lockpicks from a single steel ingot!

This mod is also available on the [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=7765]Steam Workshop[/url]
author: Kromey
